channel.title: Pages on pitch patch
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on pitch patch

item.title: About
item.description: Hi There I am Michael and I make videos about synths and cool stuff. If you want to know all about a certain piece of gear dont like reading manuals want to get inspired or just like listening to music this channel (and blog) is for you! Feel free to check out my blog posts, videos, and pitcures. Contact me if you have any questions.

item.title: Contact
item.description: I Would Love to Hear From You If you have any questions or inquiries, you can DM me on Instagram or send an email to website@pitchpat.ch. Interested in collaborating? If you have a product and want to promote it, I would love to hear from you! Among other things, I make product demos and jams that showcase the potential of products in-depth walkthroughs that explain the features unboxing videos and short clips that get people excited!

item.title: Support
item.description: Big Hug if You Consider Supporting pitch patch! This channel (and blog) exists only because of you. You can support pitch patch by subscribing on YouTube, following on Instagram, or buy me a coffee. If you head out to buy stuff pls use one of the following affiliate links. I get a small kickback at no extra cost to you. No data about you is collected, stored, used, or shared!
